metadata.subject: Fw: The 'Deplorables' Called Into Battle Again - WSJ

relationships.description: Former political advisor to President Trump
Bannon forwarding political article to Epstein

analysis.purpose: Forwarding a Wall Street Journal article about Steve Bannon's political strategy for the midterm elections
analysis.significance: Shows communication between Steve Bannon and Jeffrey Epstein regarding political strategy and media coverage

notable_quotes: "Steve Bannon doesn't do subtle. So it's no surprise that there's nothing subtle about the new movie President Trump's onetime political guru has produced to energize the Trump base for this year's midterm elections."
"This is all grass roots," Mr. Bannon says. "It's 2016 all over again...This is Trump's first re-election."

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present in this document

illegal_activity.description: Document contains a forwarded news article about political strategy, not first-hand illegal activity

details: Wall Street Journal article by Gerald F. Seib about Steve Bannon's political strategy
References to media polling and political advertising data

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a publicly available Wall Street Journal article about political strategy during the 2018 midterm elections

analysis.summary: Steve Bannon forwards a Wall Street Journal article to Jeffrey Epstein about his political strategy film 'Trump at War' and the Republican approach to motivating voters for the 2018 midterm elections through fear of impeachment and economic messaging.
